vusa 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Write File to Project

    write_file_proj.Rd

    Writes an object to a file in the project directory with specified saving options (RDS, CSV, or FST). Utilizes both manual and configuration settings for writing the file.

    write_file_proj(
  object,
  name,
  settings_df = load_and_save_config_proj(),
  settings_type = NULL,
  dir = NULL,
  save_rds = NULL,
  save_csv = NULL,
  save_fst = NULL,
  sub_dir = NA_character_,
  rds_version = 2,
  csv_na = "",
  csv_sep = ";",
  csv_dec = ",",
  fst_compress = 100,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    object

    The object to be written.

    name

    Character, name of the file.

    settings_df

    Data frame containing settings, defaults to the result of load_and_save_config_proj().

    settings_type

    Character, the type of setting to use, default is NULL.

    dir

    Character, directory path, default is NULL.

    save_rds

    Logical, whether to save as RDS, default is NULL.

    save_csv

    Logical, whether to save as CSV, default is NULL.

    save_fst

    Logical, whether to save as FST, default is NULL.

    sub_dir

    Character, sub-directory, default is NA_character_.

    rds_version

    Numeric, version for RDS files, default is 2.

    csv_na

    Character, NA representation for CSV files, default is "".

    csv_sep

    Character, separator for CSV files, default is ";".

    csv_dec

    Character, decimal separator for CSV files, default is ",".

    fst_compress

    Numeric, compression level for FST files, default is 100.

    ...

    Additional arguments to be passed to the saving functions.

    Value

    NULL, the file is saved to the specified path.

    Contents
